DataElement.preferredName: Medication Other Than For Pain Relief Administered Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to whether or not medication other than for pain relief was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medication Other Than For Pain Relief Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product._Distinct from those already mentioned, listed, or considered._The reason of something._A lessening of pain following an intervention._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Property.preferredName: Other Than For Pain Relief Administered
Property.preferredDefinition: Distinct from those already mentioned, listed, or considered.:The reason of something.:A lessening of pain following an intervention.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Distinct from those already mentioned, listed, or considered.
A lessening of pain following an intervention.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
